1-for-1 Grill N' Chill Dinner Buffet at Sanctuary Tearoom
01 Sep 2024 - 31 Oct 2024
Indulge in a sizzling weekend with a 1-for-1 Grill N’ Chill Buffet Dinner at $138++ per adult . Immerse yourself in the serenity of lush greenery as you enjoy a wide selection of barbecued seafood and meats! Highlights include  Grilled Wagyu Steak with Cajun Spices, Satay Pork Belly, Sambal Stingray, Sichuan-style Grilled Giant Squid, Maine Lobster Claw, Peri Peri Prawn, an array of sweet indulgences and more. Available every Friday, Saturday and Sunday, 6.00pm to 10.00pm

Kids receive a complimentary plush keychain with every visit they make to the S.E.A. Aquarium from 1 Sep to 30 Nov!

Let your kids go on a marine adventure with a friendly octopus, smiley sea jelly or an adorable manta ray as they learn about the real-life counterparts of their new buddies in our immersive aquarium. 

Promotion includes:
• 1 x S.E.A. Aquarium Child One-Day Ticket (ages 4 to 12 years old)
• 1 x Plush Keychain (Choose between manta ray, sea jelly and octopus)*

*Redeemable at SEAA Treasures during park operating hours on the ticketed date of visit. While stocks last.

Splash Up an Evening with No Cover Charge at Splash Tribe

31 Jul 2024 - 31 Dec 2024
Transform evenings into a feast of joy, laughter and great food at Splash Tribe. Add waves of delight to your evenings with no cover charge required for everyone from 5pm daily.

Play, dip and dine with crowd-pleasing food and beverages available for a scrumptious dinner by the beach. Whether you’re in the mood for grilled seafood, hearty burgers, kids’ specials or vibrant salads, Splash Tribe has something to tickle everyone’s palate.

Breeze down slides at the sandcastle-themed water play area or sit back and relax as the sun sets, creating unforgettable memories with loved ones over a leisurely night out.
